title: Tartuffe (or The Impostor)  -  Moliere   (1968)
description:
Audio Books : Literary : Other quality : English

I present the 1968 Caedmon recording of The Stratford National Theatre of Canada's English-language production of MoliÃƒÂ¨re's "Tartuffe" (1664), transferred by me to digital from a library copy of the original 3 LP set.



Cast:

William Hutt, Douglas Rain, Barbara Bryne, Martha Henry, Pat Galloway, Kenneth Welsh, Mia Anderson, Leo Ciceri, Leon Pownall, Mervyn Blake, Kenneth Pogue

The Stratford Festival of Canada in Stratford, Ontario

Translated by Richard Wilbur
Directed by Jean Gascon

The Theatre Recording Society
A Caedmon Production
TRS 332

Format: FLAC
Size: 539 MB
Duration: 1:57:16

Included in the torrent folder are some images related to the production.

The cover of the library copy was quite battered, so I included some less than adequate images of the box found on the internet.
